item.title: A White Van parked outside 74 blocking driveway for over 2 months., 20th August
item.description:

item.title: More human poo in our bins, 20th August
item.description:
Last lot still there and now fresh poo this morning smelly and covered in flies next door to us and borough market hundreds of visitors passing by Please remove - not cover this time as remains and gets slipped on and spread- and find a long term solution to this daily ongoing problem We canâ€™t use our bins and it gives Southwark a very bad name next to a tourist spot

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28-30, Park Street, The Borough, London
